thread.title: Cleveland mother and son accused in kidnapping, beating that left woman with collapsed lung, broken bones
thread.title_full: Cleveland mother and son accused in kidnapping, beating that left woman with collapsed lung, broken bones

author: Courtney Astolfi, cleveland.com
title: Cleveland mother and son accused in kidnapping, beating that left woman with collapsed lung, broken bones
text: A Cleveland man and his mother are both charged in connection with a beating in the city's Glenville neighborhood.
